headline: Ask HN: What is your experience with equity refresher grants?
description:
I am trying to understand how to better negotiate equity grants after reading some articles that explore changes to compensation practices, so I wanted to ask the community about their experiences:

- Company stage? Seed, Series A, B, ..., D, etc.

- How was it explained to you? Terms, requirements for grant, communicated verbally or written, etc.

- If you have experience as founder, executive, or equivalent role in trying to convince the board to approve an equity refresher program, how did it go? Board member awareness of the concept, concerns, etc.

Some of the readings that spurred this question, and for context purposes:

[1, PDF] https://go.gusto.com/rs/110-WOX-868/images/An%20Entrepreneur%E2%80%99s%20Guide%20to%20Employee%20Equity.pdf

[2] https://blog.samaltman.com/employee-equity
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 您在股权进修补助方面有什么经验？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 您在股權進修補助方面有什麼經驗？
description_zh-Hans:
在阅读了一些探讨报酬做法变化的文章后，我正试图了解如何更好地谈判股权授予，所以我想问问社区的经验：

- 公司阶段？种子期、A轮、B轮、......、D轮，等等。

- 如何向你解释？条款、拨款要求、口头或书面沟通，等等。

- 如果你有作为创始人、高管或同等角色试图说服董事会批准股权进修计划的经验，情况如何？董事会成员对这一概念的认识、关注点等。

激发这一问题的一些读物，以及为了说明情况：

[1, PDF] https://go.gusto.com/rs/110-WOX-868/images/An%20Entrepreneur%E2%80%99s%20Guide%20to%20Employee%20Equity.pdf

[2] https://blog.samaltman.com/employee-equity
description_zh-Hant:
在閱讀了一些探討報酬做法變化的文章後，我正試圖瞭解如何更好地談判股權授予，所以我想問問社區的經驗：

- 公司階段？種子期、A輪、B輪、......、D輪，等等。

- 如何向你解釋？條款、撥款要求、口頭或書面溝通，等等。

- 如果你有作為創始人、高管或同等角色試圖說服董事會批准股權進修計劃的經驗，情況如何？董事會成員對這一概念的認識、關注點等。

激發這一問題的一些讀物，以及為了說明情況：

[1, PDF] https://go.gusto.com/rs/110-WOX-868/images/An%20Entrepreneur%E2%80%99s%20Guide%20to%20Employee%20Equity.pdf

[2] https://blog.samaltman.com/employee-equity
